value:
$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... What to do... Without my
sister here to help, I'm not sure of
the correct course.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Don't fret, my dear little Laevatein.
If you need help outlining the strategy
that is best for yo—$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|Hey! This isn't a two-on-one deal!
Let's go, green army! We gotta win—
and before they gang up on us!$k$p
